_sText:
This is my first ever Counter-Strike map.

It is designed around a central post, hence it's WiP name gg_central_post.
There are two rings which radiate from around this central post.
On either side of the central post there is a ladder leading from each team's spawn to the top.
There are also two walkways/bridges leading from the center to the outer ring.
In the outer ring, a ladder leads up to the bridge.

It is quite small, but can easily support 24 players, and is quite a bloodbath with this many players.
This map is designed for Gun Game, and therefore does not have any buy zones.
